title: Inventory of inventories or what?
post: USB describes a popular connector used to connect everything from keyboards to phones to computers: Universal Serial Bus.  It is not a format of which I am aware.
author: Andy Weiss

title: Inventory of inventories or what?
post: Pardon my error – when I attended the Shroud Conference at Valencia, Spain, Ian Wilson expained to me that he had between 400-500 digitized images of Images of Jesus modeled after the Image of Edessa – on a USB DRIVE!
author: Francis J. DeStefano
